general.gigTitle: develop squarespace website, design or redesign squarespace website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Wix, WordPress, Webflow Website Designer and Developer
sellerCard.description: Hi, I am an expert and highly experienced web designer. I have been creating websites for over 5 years, so I know all the intricacies of website design from domain registration to customization in Shopify, Wix, WordPress, Webflow, Squarespace, GoDaddy, and other CMS platforms. I can design your website from scratch or redesign the existing one to acceptable modern standards. I can create a custom website to your liking, and make changes based on your requirements. I'll optimize your online store for mobile and desktop to make an impact online.

description.content:
Hi Fiverr Community,


If you are looking for a brand new Squarespace website design or need to make any changes to your existing site, you are in the right place.


Over the 4+ years of experience on the Squarespace platform, I have solid experience designing a professional and modern website. Also, I will make sure the website will be on both mobile and desktop devices so that you can make an impact online.


Please share your project details to review them and get started.


What We Offer:


  • Complete Website Design
  • Redesign with Better Layout
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Attractive Landing Pages
  • Responsive Layout for Mobile | Laptop | Tablet
  • SEO Friendly Features
  • Integrate Contact Form
  • Shop Customization
  • 100% Customizable Layout
  • Pop Up Subscriptions
  • Contact Forms
  • Google Maps Integration
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • Domain Integration


Why Me?


  • 4+ Years Experience
  • Excellent Communication Skills
  • Fast Delivery
  • 30 Days Free Support


Always on the look for exciting projects to work on and innovative people to collaborate with.

slide.name: develop squarespace website, design or redesign squarespace website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do I need to provide you to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need Squarespace login details to get started. Also, you can share the website title, pages and their names, color Scheme, images and logo(if any), any sample website I can take inspiration from.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about Responsive Design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It’s really important cause every user nowadays uses a smartphone for visiting any website, that's why responsive design needs to have a clear and excellent appearance. No worries, I have a great experience with responsive design.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Have you experienced any Squarespace websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I've made more than 140+ Squarespace websites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer discounts?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer discounted rates to those with big or multiple projects.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you do the e-commerce website on Squarespace?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can make e-commerce websites using the Squarespace platform.

reviews.comment: I had a great experience with him. The website was completed swiftly, and the quality is exceptional. I highly recommend him!
He did an amazing job with the changes I requested for my website. I highly recommend him and will definitely reach out for any future needs.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing work! He was professional, responsive, and delivered exactly what I needed. Communication was clear, and they were open to revisions without any issues. The quality of the final product exceeded my expectations. I will definitely be ordering again!
Amazing work! He tackled every detail with precision and made sure I was happy with the result. I couldn’t ask for better service.

I had a great experience working with him. He listened to all my ideas and turned them into something amazing. The final result was exactly what I envisioned, and he delivered it on time. I’m looking forward to working with him again!

seller_response.comment: Your timely feedback and clear vision made this project a success.
